mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, actor, area, directed_by, info, "language", db_name, picture, rate, show_time, "time", total_money, "type", video, is_show
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from movie
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into movie (create_time, update_time, actor, area, directed_by, info, "language", db_name, picture, rate, show_time, "time", total_money, "type", video, is_show) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{showTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update movie
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actor = #{record.actor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
directed_by = #{record.directedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{record.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"language" = #{record.language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

rate = #{record.rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
show_time = #{record.showTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
"time" = #{record.time,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_money = #{record.totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
"type" = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video = #{record.video,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_show = #{record.isShow,jdbcType=BIT},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
